home.heroDescription: A movement dedicated to creating positive change and empowering every citizen for a progressive, inclusive, and prosperous India.
home.missionDesc: We are committed to empowering every citizen and creating positive change across India through inclusive development, transparency, and democratic participation.
home.visionDesc: A progressive, inclusive, and prosperous India where every citizen has equal opportunities and voice in shaping the nation's future.
home.democracyDesc: Strengthening democratic institutions and citizen participation
home.equalityDesc: Ensuring equal opportunities for all citizens regardless of background
home.transparencyDesc: Operating with complete transparency and accountability
home.inclusionDesc: Building an inclusive society that celebrates diversity

about.title: About Bahujan Kranti Party
about.subtitle: Understanding Our Movement
about.description: The Bahujan Kranti Party is a progressive political movement dedicated to creating positive change and empowering every citizen for a prosperous India.
about.historyDesc: Founded on the principles of inclusive development and democratic participation, we have grown into a national movement focused on grassroots empowerment.
about.principle1Desc: We believe in the power of informed, engaged citizens to create change.
about.principle2Desc: We are committed to addressing inequality and ensuring fair treatment for all.
about.principle3Desc: Development that benefits everyone and preserves our environment.
about.principle4Desc: We uphold the highest standards of democratic governance and transparency.

leadership.title: Visionary Leadership
leadership.subtitle: for a Better India
leadership.description: Dedicated individuals united in their mission to create positive change and empower every citizen
leadership.statePresentTexts: Visionary leaders driving our movement across India
leadership.discoverOpportunities: Discover opportunities to serve your state and strengthen our movement
leadership.stateCommitteeDesc: The {state} committee is dedicated to building our party's presence and leadership across the state. We are actively recruiting talented individuals who share our vision for a progressive and inclusive India.
leadership.contactStateLeader: Contact your state leader to learn more about getting involved.

manifesto.title: Our Manifesto
manifesto.subtitle: A Blueprint for Change
manifesto.description: Our manifesto outlines our commitment to creating a progressive, inclusive, and prosperous India.
manifesto.intro: The Bahujan Kranti Party presents a comprehensive vision for transforming India into a nation where every citizen has equal opportunities and voice.
manifesto.pillar1Desc: Creating sustainable jobs, supporting small businesses, and ensuring fair wages for all workers.
manifesto.pillar2Desc: Quality education accessible to every child, regardless of economic background.
manifesto.pillar3Desc: Universal healthcare ensuring every citizen has access to quality medical services.
manifesto.pillar4Desc: Addressing systemic inequalities and ensuring equal rights for all communities.
manifesto.pillar5Desc: Protecting our environment while ensuring sustainable development for future generations.
manifesto.pillar6Desc: Strengthening democratic institutions and ensuring transparent, accountable governance.
